content: shadow knit checkerboard baby blanket designed by clara masessa www kraemeryarns com spun in the usa since 1907 shadow knit checker- insert picture board baby blanket designed by clara masessa skill level yarn weight gauge 36 row = 4 measurements approx 30 x 30 yarn s kraemer yarns perfection dk 30% u s merino wool/70% acrylic 2 balls mc dark color 2 balls cc light color shown in colors copper and chirp knitting needle s us 6 4 mm 24 circular notions large - eye darning needle for weaving in ends shadow knit checkerboard baby blanket shadow checkerboard baby blanket chart shadow knit checkerboard baby blanket row 30 with mc *p19 k19 repeat from * designer notes across row  start with the dark colored yarn this af- row 32 with cc *p19 k19 repeat from * ghan is knit by alternating 2 row of the across row dark colored yarn and 2 row of the light row 34 with mc *k19 p19 repeat from * colored yarn the first row rs of each across row color is all knit stitches all the patterning row 35 58 repeat row 31 34 keeping in is done on the wrong side row and be- pattern and color sequence refer to chart cause of that the instructions will list the even # row ws only row 60 with cc *p19 k19 repeat from *  when choosing colors for this project across row choose contrasting colors repeat the 60 row 3 more times bobble with cc light colored yarn begin baby blanket using mc darker color co 152 sts row 1 rs all odd numbered row with mc k across row see designers note also refer to chart for pattern and color sequence row 2 ws with mc *p19 k19 repeat from * across row row 3 with cc k across row row 4 with cc *k19 p19 repeat from * across row row 5 28 repeat row 1- 4 while keeping in color sequence every other row
